snippet: Investigators focused on a Swiss lawyer, a real estate businessman and a French luxury car exporter with a prison record as they unraveled the plot behind the $50 million robbery.
abstract: Belgian authorities investigating $50 million diamond robbery at Brussels airport begin releasing some of more than 30 men questioned in connection with theft; narrow focus on select suspects.
lead_paragraph: Investigators focused on a Swiss lawyer, a real estate businessman and a French luxury car exporter with a prison record as they unraveled the plot behind the $50 million robbery.

headline.seo: Focus Turns to 3 Suspects in $50 Million Belgian Diamond Robbery
headline.main: Focus Turns to 3 Suspects in Belgian Diamond Robbery
